00048 /*
00049 **   If no memory checking is required (i.e., memdebug is undefined at compilation time)
00050 **      the memory checking functions are wiped out by the following macro definitions.
00051 */
00052 
00053 #ifndef __memdebug__
00054 #define __memdebug__
00055 
00056 #include <stdlib.h>
00057 
00058 #ifndef MEMDEBUG
00059 
00060 #define VarInfo(p1)
00061 #define generate_MemdebugError()
00062 #define   print_MemdebugStatistics()
00063 #define   check_MemdebugError()      0
00064 
00065 #define set_MemdebugOptions(p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6,p7,p8,p9,p10,p11)
00066 
00067 /* replaced by above expression, as the preprocessor may have difficulties with the continuation character
00068 
00069 #define set_MemdebugOptions(p_GeneralStatistics,p_AlphabeticalList,\
00070 p_NotFreeList,p_CallSequenceList,p_SpuriousFreeList,\
00071 p_PrintContents,p_DestroyContents,p_GenerateErrorCount,p_MaximalMemoryAvailable,\
00072 p_StatisticsFileName,p_ErrorFileName)
00073 */
00074 
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 /*
00078    We need the following definitions only when memory checking is required at compilation
00079       time. This is indicated by defining the memdebug pre-processor symbol.
00080        
00081    The VAXC preprocessor doesn't implement stringization: "???"
00082 */
00083 
00084 #ifdef MEMDEBUG
00085 #ifndef VAX
00086 
00087 #define malloc(p_Size)    __check_malloc   (p_Size,#p_Size,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00088 #define calloc(p_Number,p_Size)   __check_calloc   (p_Number,p_Size,#p_Size,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00089 #define realloc(p_Name,p_Size)   __check_realloc   (p_Name,p_Size,#p_Name,#p_Size,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00090 #define free(p_Name)       __check_free   (p_Name,#p_Name,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00091 
00092 #else
00093 
00094 #define malloc(p_Size)       __check_malloc   (p_Size,"p_Size",__FILE__,__LINE__)
00095 #define calloc(p_Number,p_Size)   __check_calloc   (p_Number,p_Size,"p_Size",__FILE__,__LINE__)
00096 #define realloc(p_Name,p_Size)   __check_realloc   (p_Name,p_Size,   "p_Name","p_Size",__FILE__,__LINE__)
00097 #define free(p_Name)      __check_free   (p_Name,"p_Name",__FILE__,__LINE__)
00098 
00099 #endif
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 /**************************************************************************/
00103 /******************************* Data Types *******************************/
00104 /**************************************************************************/
00105 
00106 #ifndef __t_biState__
00107 #define __t_biState__
00108 
00109 /*
00110    This is kind of a BOOLEAN type, but with more and thus clearer
00111       names for the different states
00112 */
00113 
00114 enum t_biState 
00115 {
00116    c_Off   = 0,
00117    c_On,
00118    
00119    c_False = 0,
00120    c_True,
00121    
00122    c_No   = 0,
00123    c_Yes
00124 };
00125 
00126 typedef enum t_biState t_biState;
00127 
00128 #endif

00154 /*************************************************************************/
00155 /************************* Function Prototypes ***************************/

00158 void  * __check_malloc     (   size_t      p_Size,
00159                      char     * p_SizeExpression,
00160                      char     * p_FileName,
00161                      long      p_LineNumber);
00162                   
00163 void  * __check_calloc     (   size_t      p_Number,
00164                      size_t      p_Size,
00165                      char     * p_SizeExpression,
00166                      char     * p_FileName,
00167                      long      p_LineNumber);
00168                   
00169 void  *   __check_realloc     ( void     * p_Pointer,
00170                      size_t      p_Size,
00171                      char     *   p_NameString,
00172                      char     *   p_SizeExpression,
00173                      char     * p_FileName,
00174                      long      p_LineNumber);
00175    
00176 void   __check_free     ( void     * p_Pointer,
00177                      char     * p_NameString,
00178                      char     * p_FileName,
00179                      long      p_LineNumber);
00180

00182 void print_MemdebugStatistics     ( void );
00183 int    check_MemdebugError        ( void );

00185                            t_biState      p_AlphabeticalList,
00186                            t_biState      p_NotFreeList,
00187                            t_biState      p_CallSequenceList,
00188       
00189                            t_biState      p_SpuriousFreeList,
00190                            
00191                            t_biState      p_PrintContents,
00192                            t_biState      p_DestroyContents,
00193

00195                            unsigned long   p_MaximalMemoryAvailable,
00196                            
00197                            char        * p_StatisticsFileName,
00198                            char        * p_ErrorFileName
00199                           );
00200 
00201 
00202 #ifdef __cplusplus
00203 
00204 }   // close the extern "C" declaration
